summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2567, for the improvement of 31st Avenue South from Yesler Way to Jackson Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same with brick or some other suitable material laid upon a proper concrete foundation, the construction of concrete and armored concrete curbs; and by construction and reconstruction of all sewers, side sewers, and water mains with the appurtenances that may be necessary for the proper water service and fire protection of said district.
